```{r chunk2, include = F}
unmapped_aes <- aes(size = I(8),  
        alpha = I(.7),      
        color = I("goldenrod3"), 
        linewidth = I(1))

ggplot(cars, 
    aes(x = speed, 
        y = dist,
        !!!unmapped_aes)
    ) + 
  geom_point() + # unmapped aes here
  geom_density2d() # and here!
```
